recipesJson.name: Rin's Fruit Taffy
recipesJson.author: mixinvixens
recipesJson.description: Strawberry taffy base, marshmallow to add to body and mouthfeel. Citrus soda for a pop of lime, will fall back if steeped. I wanted a pineapple gummy so I went for CAP 27 bears as it tastes like a white/pineapple gummy bear. 27 swedish fish to provide something different.
